children.subject: No, it's not paid in money )= however!! you will be paid in great memories and friendships during a sad remote semester (=

history.content:
Are you interested in teaching computer science or have experience in web development or design?

Meet Web Development at Berkeley! We are UC Berkeley's first web development-focused organization, bringing full-stack web development education and industry development experience to UC Berkeley students.

We are recruiting students with web development experience that are interested in joining the course staff for our organization's education branch in Spring 2021. You will be able to teach valuable skills to fellow students interested in computer science. We have positions open for Frontend Educators, Backend Educators, UI/UX Design Educators, and Readers/Tutors.

We are also in search of project and product managers to lead our internal projects branch and our industry client branch, respectively. You will be responsible for managing a team of 5-6 developers and designers in completing a full-stack project. We have worked with several really cool early-stage and high-growth startups in the past, and have many more lined up for the spring.

If you're interested in any of these positions (or multiple!), fill out the attached form. In-depth role descriptions are contained in the form! If you can't join us but have connections who might be interested, we'd love it if you sent them our way.

For more info, check us out at webatberkeley.org to see what we're all about.

We are looking forward to meeting you all!

Apply here:

webatberkeley.org/apply

Have Questions?

webatberkeley@gmail.com
history.subject: Web Development Positions: Product Management and Education
